title: Vintage Chandbali Earring with Polki and Emerald Drop
features: Chandbali style design featuring a central Polki diamond encircled by smaller diamonds. The Polki is meticulously set in a closed setting to enhance its brilliance. A vibrant pear-shaped Emerald drop adds a touch of color and sophistication. The piece showcases traditional Hyderabadi craftsmanship with its intricate gold work and antique finish.
occasions: and other traditional South Indian celebrations. Also suitable for adding a touch of elegance to evening events.
description: This exquisite Chandbali earring is a testament to timeless South Indian elegance. The combination of uncut Polki diamonds and a vibrant Emerald drop creates a captivating contrast. The Hyderabadi polish ensures a long-lasting luster and adds to its heirloom quality. A true investment piece that will be cherished for generations.
